医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
Insilico Medicine的AI驱动药物Rentosertib收到了官方通用名称Insilico Medicine（“ Insilico”）是一家临床阶段生成人工智能（AI）驱动的生物技术公司，最近宣布，其特发性肺纤维化（IPF）的突破性药物候选药物（IPF） - Rentosertib - Rentosertib（以ISM001-055的名字闻名，已被授予美国官方名称（曾经被称为ISM001-055），该名称是由美国官方的名字（United nestial Counce）（United Anternational Counce）（USENDENDENDEND）（USENDENEN COLDAN CONDENS COLDENS）（USENDENTIND ANTISE COLDAN）（USENDENDENTIND COLDAN）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/insilico-medicines-ai-ai-driven-drug-rentog-rentosertib-rentib-receives-finceincial-name.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/insilico-medicines-medicines-ai-ai-driven-drug-rentog-rentosertib-rentib-receives-finceive-fincial-generic-name.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e8b12d9-2764-42fa-b6eb-7928abe5b226 Fri, 07 Mar 2025 08:06:05 -0500 Insilico Medicine's AI-driven drug Rentosertib receives official generic name
试验显示，速度食品标签减少了学校的含糖食品新的研究发现，在英国中学进行了替代食品标签的试验，该试验显示了燃烧卡路里所需的体育锻炼的时间数 - 减少了对含糖食品的购买量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/trial-shows-pace-food-labeling-labeling-reduces-sgary-food-food-purchases-in-schools.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/trial-shows-pace-pace-food-labeling-labeling-reduces-sugary-food-purchases-in-schools.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=533727A7-A203-4339-AA31-EA31-E3F2A407D367 Fri, 07 Mar 2025 08:01:32 -0500 Trial shows PACE food labeling reduces sugary food purchases in schools
研究人员发现抗体如何预防链球菌感染研究人员发现了抗体如何有助于防止由链球菌A（包括链球菌喉咙）引起的传染性细菌感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/researchers-uncover-how-antibodies-protect-against-against-strep-a-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/researchers-uncover-how-antibodies-protect-against-against-strep-a-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bbed8221-019D-492D-8EB6-47480F5D90D4 Fri, 07 Mar 2025 07:53:08 -0500 Researchers uncover how antibodies protect against Strep A infections
英国残疾妇女面临严重的产妇不平等根据一份新报告，英国的残疾妇女占育龄妇女的20％，在孕产妇和新生儿结局中面临严重的不平等现象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/disabled-women-in-in-the-the-uk-face-simprificant-maternity-inequalities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/disabled-women-in-the-the-uk-face-simprificant-maternity-inequalities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7E5DF8E2-2E00-442C-8CB9-606F430DA4B7 Fri, 07 Mar 2025 07:42:30 -0500 Disabled women in the UK face significant maternity inequalities
新算法增强了无序蛋白质结构的预测本质上无序的蛋白质（IDP）不能达到稳定的二级或三级结构，并迅速改变其构象，从而使结构预测特别具有挑战性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/new-algorithm-enhances-prediction-prediction-of-disordered-protein-scruptures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/new-algorithm-enhances-prediction-prediction-prediction-of-disordered-protein-structures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa84c53b-8787-4cd6-9530-925a0e801639 Fri, 07 Mar 2025 07:38:55 -0500 New algorithm enhances prediction of disordered protein structures
UCSF研究人员使瘫痪的人能够用大脑信号控制机器人臂加州大学旧金山分校的研究人员使一个人瘫痪了通过将他的大脑信号传递到计算机的设备控制机器人手臂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/ucsf-researchers-enable-paralyzed-man-man-man-to-control-robotic-arbotic-arm-arm-with-brain-brain-signals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/ucsf-researchers-enable-paralyzed-man-man-to-control-robototic-arbototic-arm-robotic-arm-with-brain-brain-signals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0E676647-1BBF-4D5B-A8E8-B54BA52A8DB4 Fri, 07 Mar 2025 07:31:35 -0500 UCSF researchers enable paralyzed man to control robotic arm with brain signals
马蒂·马克里（Marty Makary）通常是大流行评论家，他准备带领他反对的FDA去年秋天，小组成员被要求表达他们的遗憾 - 他们在大流行期间支持的政策，但被认为是误导的。 Covid接触跟踪，一个人说。另一个关闭学校说。疫苗规定，三分之一说。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/marty-marty-makary-often-wrong-as-as-pandemic-critic-critic-is-poine-poine-poine po- to-to-lead-the-the-fda-he-railed-railed-railed-against.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/marty-marty-makary-often-wrong-as-pandemic-critic-critic-is-poised-to-lead-to-lead-the-the-the-fda-he-ard-he-ard--he-arc.-against.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9E8C3E51-EFD0-45F5-8595-4B8003D83065 Fri, 07 Mar 2025 06:47:16 -0500 Marty Makary, often wrong as pandemic critic, is poised to lead the FDA he railed against

基于音乐的疗法可能使痴呆症患者受益一项新的Cochrane评论发现，基于音乐的疗法可能使患有痴呆症患者有益，特别是通过改善抑郁症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/music-base--therapy-may-benefit-people-people-people-living-with-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250307/music-base--therapy-may-benefit-people-people-people-living-with-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd5a01f5-b92b-4d1E-4D1E-AF5A-183F4C230148 Fri, 07 Mar 2025 06:32:00 -0500 Music-based therapy may benefit people living with dementia
